user_id.about: The ID of the user for whom to return results for.

screen_name.about: The screen name of the user for whom to return results for.

cursor.about: A string identifying the segment of the current result set to retrieve. Values for this parameter are yielded in the cursors node attached to response objects. Usage of the count parameter affects cursoring.

count.about: Specifies the maximum number of results to include in the response. Specify a count between 1 and 200. A next_cursor value will be provided in the response if additional results are available.

skip_status.about: When set to either true , t or 1 , statuses will not be included in the returned user objects. If set to any other value, statuses will be included.

include_user_entities.about: The user object entities node will not be included when set to false.
